description.english: Made your best efforts to miss the funeral
description.german: Hast dein Bestes getan, die Beerdigung zu verpassen
description.french: A fait de son mieux pour rater l'enterrement
description.italian: Hai fatto il possibile per evitare il funerale
description.spanish: Hiciste todo lo posible por perderte el funeral

description.polish: Starałaś się z całych sił opuścić pogrzeb
description.brazilian: Fez o máximo para perder o enterro

description.english: Lost track of time on the road
description.french: A perdu la notion du temps sur la route
description.italian: Per strada, hai perso la nozione del tempo
description.spanish: Perdiste la noción del tiempo en la carretera
description.schinese: 在路上忘记了时间
description.polish: Starałaś się z całych sił opuścić pogrzeb
description.brazilian: Perdeu a noção do tempo na estrada

description.english: Next level lowballing
description.french: Vous vous êtes montrée radine au possible.
description.italian: Una spinta avanzata sui prezzi
description.spanish: Siguiente nivel de regateo
description.schinese: 虚报低价大师
description.brazilian: Essa lábia está em outro patamar

description.english: Tortured an imprisoned bum
description.french: A torturé un clochard en prison
description.italian: Hai torturato un barbone in prigione
description.spanish: Torturaste a un vagabundo encarcelado
description.schinese: 折磨一个被监禁的流浪汉
description.brazilian: Torturou um vagabundo encarcerado

displayName.spanish: El tacto no es lo tuyo

description.english: Felt no apparent need to let Lenny down gently
description.german: Hast kein Interesse daran gezeigt, Lenny sanft abzuservieren
description.french: N'a pas ressenti le besoin de rembarrer Lenny gentiment
description.italian: Non hai sentito il bisogno di scaricare Lenny senza ferirlo
description.spanish: No sentiste necesidad alguna de rechazar a Lenny con delicadeza
description.schinese: 觉得没必要温柔地让兰尼失望
description.polish: Nie czułaś potrzeby, by delikatnie odrzucić zaloty Lenny'ego
description.brazilian: Não sentiu necessidade alguma de dispensar Lenny com delicadeza

displayName.german: Mr. Bär meldet sich zum Dienst!
displayName.spanish: El Sr. Oso, ¡presente para el servicio!

description.english: Reunited with a furry friend
description.french: A retrouvé un ami poilu
description.italian: Hai ritrovato un vecchio amico peloso
description.spanish: Reunida con un amigo peludo
description.schinese: 和一个毛茸茸的朋友团聚
description.polish: Ponownie spotkałaś się z włochatym przyjacielem
description.brazilian: Reuniu-se com um amigo peludo

description.english: Revealed yourself as a creature of the night
description.german: Dich als Geschöpf der Nacht erkennen gegeben
description.french: Vous vous êtes découvert une affinité avec l'obscurité.
description.italian: Ti sei rivelato come una creatura della notte
description.spanish: Te revelaste como una criatura de la noche
description.schinese: 在暗夜中揭露自己的真面目
description.brazilian: Revelou-se uma criatura da noite

description.english: Engaged in flirtatious behavior on the computer
description.french: S'est comportée de manière suggestive sur l'ordinateur
description.italian: Comportamento malizioso sul computer
description.spanish: Tuviste un comportamiento coqueto en el ordenador
description.schinese: 在电脑上从事调情行为
description.brazilian: Entrou em comportamento de paquera no computador

description.english: Learned a cold hard truth about your face
description.german: Die bittere Wahrheit über dein Gesicht erfahren
description.french: A appris une triste vérité sur votre visage
description.italian: Hai appreso una triste verità sul tuo viso
description.spanish: Aprendiste una fría y dura verdad acerca de tu cara
description.schinese: 从你的脸上学到了冷酷无情的道理
description.polish: Dowiedziałaś się ciężkiej prawdy o swojej twarzy
description.brazilian: Descobriu uma verdade dura e fria sobre o seu rosto

description.english: Had a compulsion to barbeque a bear
description.german: Hatte den Drang, einen Bären zu grillen
description.french: Vous avez eu une envie soudaine de faire griller un nounours.
description.italian: Ho avuto l'impulso di grigliare un orso
description.spanish: Tuviste la compulsión de churrascar un oso
description.schinese: 抑制住了烧烤一头熊的冲动
description.brazilian: Bateu uma vontade louca de fazer churrasco de urso

description.english: Amplified Goober's "lung cancer"
description.french: A aggravé le cancer du poumon de Goober
description.italian: Cancro al polmone terminale per Goober
description.spanish: Amplificaste el cáncer de pulmón de Goober
description.schinese: 增强版古柏的肺癌
description.brazilian: Aumentou o câncer de pulmão do Goober

description.english: Were mesmerized by Goober's monologues
description.french: Totalement fascinée par les monologues de Goober
description.italian: Totalmente affascinato dai monologhi di Goober
description.spanish: Totalmente fascinada por los monólogos de Goober
description.schinese: 完全被古柏的独白迷住了
description.brazilian: Totalmente fascinada pelos monólogos do Goober

description.english: Wanted to engage in a good 'ol book burning
description.german: Wolltest aus Büchern einen Scheiterhaufen basteln
description.french: Voulait se faire une petite séance de brûlage de livres
description.italian: Volevi cercare di fare un bel falò con i libri
description.spanish: Quisiste implicarte en una clásica quema de libros
description.schinese: 想看一本热辣的好书
description.polish: Chciałaś wziąć udział w starym dobrym paleniu książek
description.brazilian: Quis se engajar em uma boa e velha queima de livros

description.english: Really had it out for Goober
description.german: Hattest es wirklich auf Goober abgesehen
description.french: Avait vraiment Goober dans le collimateur
description.italian: Hai sempre Goober nel mirino
description.spanish: Le tenías manía de veras a Goober
description.schinese: 对古柏来说真的很难受
description.brazilian: Judiou do Goober

description.english: Became a huge fan of those sweet, addictive, not to mention cancer-inducing sticks of tobacco
description.german: Ein riesiger Fan dieser wunderbaren, süchtig machenden und nicht zuletzt Krebs verursachende Tabakstängelchen geworden
description.french: Est devenue une grande fan de ces délicieuses tiges à tabac si addictives, sans oublier cancérigènes
description.italian: Sei diventato un grande fan di quei deliziosi, assuefacenti, e non dimentichiamo, cancro-inducenti, bastoncini di tabacco
description.spanish: Te convertiste en una gran fan de esos bonitos, adictivos y, que no se nos olvide, cancerígenos cigarrillos
description.schinese: 成了那些甜美的，上瘾的，更不用说能诱发癌症的香烟的超级粉丝
description.polish: Stałaś się wielką fanką tych słodkich, uzależniających i rakotwórczych pałeczek tytoniu
description.brazilian: Tornou-se uma grande fã desses doces, viciantes e, não esqueçamos, cancerígenos bastões de tabaco

displayName.brazilian: Saca só o que apareceu na oficina

description.english: Made the outlaw bikers jealous of your sweet ride
description.german: Die gesetzlosen Biker mit deinem krassen Gefährt neidisch gemacht
description.french: Vous avez rendu les bikers jaloux de votre engin.
description.italian: Hai reso gelosi della tua motocicletta i motociclisti fuorilegge
description.spanish: Conseguiste que los moteros fuera de ley tuvieran celos de tu moto
description.schinese: 让那些飞车党嫉妒你
description.polish: Członkowie gangu byli zazdrośni o twoją brykę
description.brazilian: Fez inveja nos motoqueiros fora-da-lei com a sua motoca

description.english: Went to extreme lengths to reunite with Grandpa
description.german: Extreme Mühen auf sich genommen, um Großvater wiederzusehen
description.french: Vous étiez prête à tout pour retrouver votre grand-père.
description.italian: Ha fatto di tutto per riunirsi con il nonno
description.spanish: Tomaste medidas extremas para reunirte con el abuelo
description.schinese: 为与爷爷团聚，不惜铤而走险
description.polish: Użyłaś ekstremalnych środków, by znów spotkać się z dziadkiem
description.brazilian: Tomou medidas extremas para reencontrar o seu avô

description.english: Made quite a flaming escape
description.french: Vous avez fait une sortie carrément flamboyante.
description.italian: Hai fatto una fuga piuttosto fiammeggiante
description.spanish: Hiciste una fuga ardiente
description.schinese: 上演一出火热的逃脱大戏
description.brazilian: Essa fuga foi fogo

description.english: Felt a sudden urge to mow a lawn
description.german: Den plötzlichen Drang verspürt, einen Rasen zu mähen
description.french: Vous avez eu une envie soudaine de passer la tondeuse.
description.italian: Ho sentito un bisogno improvviso di falciare un prato
description.spanish: Sufriste una urgencia repentina de cortar césped
description.schinese: 突然有种想修剪草坪的冲动
description.brazilian: Do nada, quis cortar grama

description.english: Burned one up on Parowan Peak
description.french: Vous vous en êtes grillé une à Parowan Peak
description.italian: Ne hai accesa una su Parowan Peak
description.spanish: Te fumaste uno en Pico Parowan
description.schinese: 在帕罗宛峰悬崖上抽支烟
description.brazilian: Acendeu um no Pico Parowan

description.english: Tried to fullfill Jimmy's prediction
description.french: Vous avez tenté de réaliser la prédiction de Jimmy.
description.italian: Hai cercato di soddisfare la previsione di Jimmy
description.spanish: Intentaste cumplir la predicción de Jimmy
description.schinese: 尝试完成吉米的预言
description.polish: Próbowałaś zrobić to, co przewidział Jimmy
description.brazilian: Tentou cumprir a previsão de Jimmy

displayName.brazilian: Estilo é o que não falta

description.english: Unlocked all of the Katmobile designs
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les skins de la Katmobile
description.italian: Hai sbloccato tutti i design di Katmobile
description.spanish: Desbloqueaste todos los diseños de la Katmóvil
description.schinese: 解锁全部机车款式
description.brazilian: Desbloqueou todos os visuais da Katmóvel

description.english: Wanted everybody to have some goddamn coffee
description.german: Wollte, dass alle einen gottverdammten Kaffee bekommen
description.french: Vous avez voulu que tout le monde prenne un café, bon Dieu !
description.italian: Hai voluto che tutti prendessero un dannato caffè
description.spanish: Quisiste que todo el mundo se tomara un maldito café
description.schinese: 给每个人都来点该死的咖啡
description.polish: Chciałaś, żeby każdy dostał tę cholerną kawę
description.brazilian: Quis que todo mundo tomasse a porcaria do café

description.english: Came close to a premature electrocution
description.german: Kam fast zu einem vorzeitigen Strom-Erguss
description.french: Vous avez frôlé l'électrocution précoce
description.italian: Ti sei avvicinato ad una folgorazione
description.spanish: Casi sufriste una electrocución prematura
description.schinese: 差点害人触电身亡
description.brazilian: Quase teve uma eletrocussão precoce

description.english: Took some time to reminisce
description.german: Zeit genommen, um in Erinnerungen zu schwelgen
description.french: Vous avez pris le temps de vous remémorer le passé
description.italian: Ci è voluto un po' di tempo per ricordare
description.spanish: Te tomaste algún tiempo para recordar el pasado
description.schinese: 回味过去
description.brazilian: Tirou um tempo para relembrar o passado

description.english: And stay down!
description.french: T'avise pas de te relever !
description.italian: E stai giù!
description.spanish: ¡Y no te muevas!
description.schinese: 趴下别动！
description.brazilian: Fique no chão!

description.french: Skin de moto « Foudre » débloqué
description.italian: Sbloccato il design della moto "Shocker"
description.spanish: Amigo vagabundo
description.schinese: 解锁了“冲击”机车款式
description.brazilian: Novo visual para moto: "Eletrizante"
